resources.string: " INSERT OR IGNORE INTO `MemberInfo` (`first_name`,`last_name`,`phone_number`,`email`,`address`, `gender`, `age`, `image_url`, `image`, `relationship`, `family_size`, `zipcode`, `dob`, `familyHeadId`,`isFamilyHead`, `isSynced`, `city_id`, `state_id`, `country`, `image_type`, `user_role`, `role_based_user_id`, `created_by`, `aadhaar`) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?); UPDATE `MemberInfo` SET `first_name`=?,`last_name`=?,`phone_number`=?,`email`=?,`address`=?, `gender`=?, `age`=?, `image_url`=?, `image`=?, `relationship`=?, `family_size`=?, `zipcode`=?, `dob`=?, `familyHeadId`=?,`isFamilyHead`=?, `isSynced`=?, `city_id`=?, `state_id`=?, `country`=?, `image_type`=?, `user_role`=?, `role_based_user_id`=?, `created_by`=? WHERE `aadhaar` = ?

" INSERT OR IGNORE INTO `SupervisorInfo` (`first_name`,`last_name`,`phone_number`,`email`,`address`, `gender`, `age`, `image_url`, `image`, `zipcode`, `dob`, `member_count`, `isSynced`, `city_id`, `state_id`, `country`, `image_type`, `user_role`, `created_by`, `aadhaar`) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?); UPDATE `SupervisorInfo` SET `first_name`=?,`last_name`=?,`phone_number`=?,`email`=?,`address`=?, `gender`=?, `age`=?, `image_url`=?, `image`=?, `zipcode`=?, `dob`=?, `member_count`=?, `isSynced`=?, `city_id`=?, `state_id`=?, `country`=?, `image_type`=?, `user_role`=?, `created_by`=? WHERE `aadhaar` = ?
" INSERT OR IGNORE INTO `StatesInfo` (`state_name`, `state_id`) VALUES (?,?); UPDATE `StatesInfo` SET `state_name`=? WHERE `state_id` = ?
" INSERT OR IGNORE INTO `RelationsInfo` (`relation_name`, `relation_id`) VALUES (?,?); UPDATE `RelationsInfo` SET `relation_name`=? WHERE `relation_id` = ?
" INSERT OR IGNORE INTO `CityInfo` (`city_name`, `state_id`, `city_id`) VALUES (?,?,?); UPDATE `CityInfo` SET `city_name`=?, `state_id`=? WHERE `city_id` = ?

"SELECT `id` AS offline_id, `isFamilyHead`, `relationship` AS `relationship_id`, `first_name`,`last_name`, `gender`, `dob`, `phone_number`, `familyHeadId` AS `head_aadhar_number`, `aadhaar` , `email`, `address`, `city_id`, `state_id`, `country`, `zipcode`, `image` AS `user_avatar` , `image_type`, `user_role`, `role_based_user_id`, `created_by` FROM `MemberInfo` WHERE `isSynced` = ?;"
